tns:patch.author: acartaleanu
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_project_period; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_project_period AS SELECT amp_activity_id, project_period FROM ( SELECT amp_activity_id, NULLIF((Extract(month from rawdelta) + 12 * Extract(year from rawdelta) ) :: Integer ,'0') AS project_period FROM (SELECT amp_activity_id, age( proposed_completion_date, actual_start_date) AS rawdelta FROM amp_activity_version) AS rawvals ) AS computed_vals WHERE project_period IS NOT NULL;
